p: To investigate if the inhibitory effect of the extracts on the cell lines was due to induction of cell cycle arrest, MCF-7 cell line was selected and treated with S. suffruticosa extract at a concentration equal to IC50 for 48 hr; flow cytometry was used to analyze cell cycle progression. Decrease in the S phase population was accompanied by significant increases in G2/M phase population (p<0.05) after 48-hr treatment compared to the control ( Figure 3).
